com.bumptech.glide
Class Glide.Request<ModelType>

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.Glide.Request<ModelType>
Type Parameters:
ModelType - The type of model that will be loaded into the target.
Enclosing class:
Glide
public static class Glide.Request<ModelType>
extends java.lang.Object

A class for creating a request to load a bitmap for an image or from a video. Sets a variety of type independent options including resizing, animations, and placeholders.

Method Summary
 Glide.Request<ModelType> animate(int animationId)
          Sets an animation to run on the wrapped target when an image load finishes.
 Glide.Request<ModelType> approximate()
          Load images at a size near the size of the target using Downsampler.AT_LEAST.

          Load images at their original size using Downsampler.NONE.
 Glide.Request<ModelType> centerCrop()
          Transform images using CenterCrop.

          Load images using the given Downsampler.

          Sets a resource to display if a load fails

          Transform images using FitCenter.

downsample

public Glide.Request<ModelType> downsample(Downsampler downsampler)
Load images using the given Downsampler. Replaces any existing image decoder. Defaults to Downsampler.AT_LEAST. Will be ignored if the data represented by the model is a video.

Parameters:
downsampler - The downsampler
Returns:
This Request
See Also:
imageDecoder(com.bumptech.glide.resize.load.BitmapDecoder), videoDecoder(BitmapDecoder)

imageDecoder

public Glide.Request<ModelType> imageDecoder(BitmapDecoder<java.io.InputStream> decoder)
Loads the image from the given resource type into an Bitmap using the given BitmapDecoder.

Will be ignored if the data represented by the given model is not an image.

Parameters:
decoder - The BitmapDecoder to use to decode the image resource.
Returns:
This Request.
See Also:
Downsampler

videoDecoder

public Glide.Request<ModelType> videoDecoder(BitmapDecoder<android.os.ParcelFileDescriptor> decoder)
Loads the video from the given resource type into an Bitmap using the given BitmapDecoder.

Will be ignored if the data represented by the given model is not a video.

Parameters:
decoder - The BitmapDecoder to use to decode the video resource.
Returns:
This request.
See Also:
VideoBitmapDecoder

transform

public Glide.Request<ModelType> transform(TransformationLoader<ModelType> transformationLoader)
Transform images with the given TransformationLoader. Appends this transformation onto any existing transformations

Parameters:
transformationLoader - The loader to obtaian a transformation for a given model

This Request

animate

public Glide.Request<ModelType> animate(int animationId)
Sets an animation to run on the wrapped target when an image load finishes. Will only be run if the image was loaded asynchronously (ie was not in the memory cache)

Parameters:
animationId - The resource id of the animation to run
Returns:
This Request

Returns:
This Request

error

public Glide.Request<ModelType> error(int resourceId)

Returns:
This request

listener

public Glide.Request<ModelType> listener(Glide.RequestListener<ModelType> requestListener)
Sets a Request listener to monitor the image load. It's best to create a single instance of an exception handler per type of request (usually activity/fragment) rather than pass one in per request to avoid some redundant object allocation.

Parameters:
requestListener - The request listener to use
Returns:
This request
